name: Frog Frenzy (itch) (shreyaa)
description:
Freddy the frog is competing with Peter the bunny! 

Help Freddy win!

How to Play:

Use the left and right arrows to move Freddy across the screen. Collect flowers to earn points and power-ups. If you cannot reach a log or want to jump higher, use a power-up by pressing the space bar. 

Win the competition by earning 1000 points before Peter does!
